content.rendered:
Directed by Babitha Mathew. Rinn

Written by Hussain Haidry. Babitha Mathew. Rinn

Star Barbiee Sharma(Pyali). George Jacob. Sarath Kumar(Ambru). Mammukoya(Nicholan). Murugadass(Selva). Althaf Salim. Sujith Shanker. Sreenivasan(Zayidh). Karthik Vishnu

Language Malayalam. Hindi

Producers Sofia Varghese

Production NF Varghese Pictures
